data.name: Painting Thief

About the Game

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/14509579663652.jpg
This is a stealth game. The protagonist isnâ€™t too skilled at fighting.
We must use our magic and agility to hide from enemies or ambush them.

Features:
- A special & unique stealth mechanic.
- Three difficulty levels catered to those who want a casual experience, and others who seek a challenge!
- Other than hiding from your enemies, Marcia can also use various magic skills to eliminate or distract them!
- Test your skills with an intense boss fight at the end of every battle!
- Animated Live2D sex scenes.

He was just an obscure artist
...Who painted an incredible work of art.
The painting was sold for an unbelievable amount at an auction.
However, an evil art dealer sought to took advantage of his naivete.
He swindled the artist into handing over the painting.
Marcia, the artistâ€™s wife, learned of this deceitful scheme.
She was determined to punish the evil dealer, and take back the painting!
